2100470.name: Delivering Letters
2100470.description:
This is a game about postman who has to deliver last 10 letters.

This game is primarily a "walking simulator" genre you only have to click on mailbox and dont get caught by the enemy.

My idea of the game was to make a small "Party horror game" where you can watch your friends play and compete who can beat the game in better time, but you can also play alone, it's inspired by a game in which you have to collect 8 pages, but instead you are delivering 10 letters which are randomly chosen from 50 overall. Every house has a number and when you click on tab on your keyboard it shows you current letter with the house number and the house numbers are shown on the map. (press m on the keyboard) After you deliver 10 letters, you also have to leave the area to win the game.

Controlls - Movement - WSAD
Current letter - TAB
Map - M
Deliver letter - left mouse button (aim on mailbox)
Sprint - Shift
2100470.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
